attributes.action: Michael Gove limit commercial dog imports to 5 per vehicle or require titer test
attributes.additional_details: There is evidence of illegal dogs entering from Serbia, Bosnia, Ukraine, Bulgaria & Romania. Serbia and Ukraine are high risk countries. Proof is available of transporters, vets & officials involved in supplying dogs from all the aforementioned countries with Romanian passports & chips so as to travel on Romanian TRACES. Many are not vaccinated. This is illegal and a potential danger to our countries pets, people and wildlife - rabies and echinococcus. Cross border transport S. Klevar PHD et all
attributes.background: In light of the number of illegal rescue dogs entering the UK from "high risk" countries, the government should enact a quick & easy solution to this problem. Limit dogs coming in on TRACES to 5 dogs per vehicle, this removes the profit element for those involved or insist on rabies titer results

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
